text: Pierre Carniti (25 September 1936 â€“ 5 June 2018) was an Italian politician and trade unionist. He was born in Castelleone, in the province of Cremona, Lombardy. He was general secretary of CISL, a major trade union federation, between 1979 and 1985. Carniti was president of the Parliamentary Commission on Poverty from 1994 to 1997. He was a Member of the European Parliament from 1994 to 1999. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Socialists Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:Italian trade unionists
